title: Fingerprint scanner disable itself and disappear from settings menu
content: 2 days ago my pixel 2 XL disabled the fingerprint scanner and it disappeared completely from the settings menu "security and location" , since that the phone is almost unusable, it's a lag city! It lags on all apps, the only app which don't lag is settings app. I don't know what to do , because I factory reset the phone twice and still nothing
